casebody.data:
Moise LAPOINTE and Lisa LaPointe, Appellants
v.
U.S. BANK, N.A., Successor Trustee to Lasalle Bank National Association, on behalf of the Holders of Bear Stearns Asset Backed Securities I Trust 2005-HE8 Asset-Backed Certificates Series 2005-HE8, Appellee. Case No. 2D16-4724 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed February 21, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
